about_the_game:
GOBLR is a bite-sized dating sim about dating one of three absolutely disastrous goblins. (or all of them, I'm not your mom) Go on dates! Make choices! (not good ones) Have a bad time! GOBLR: Goblin Date Night Simulator is a dating sim for the modern era, where you can live out the nightmare date of your dreams. Commit vandalism, go dumpster diving, get punched in the face, summon a long sealed away demon, and find romance. (or something kinda close to it. Maybe.)

FEATURES

  • No less than THREE whole goblins for your dating displeasure
  • Dynamic narrative choices
  • Multiple unpleasant endings
  • Uncomfortably personal conversations
  • Unresolved emotional issues


Content warning: Contains open discussion of drugs, criminal acts, and mental health. Also, goblins.

content_descriptors.notes: Mention of drugs, smoking and related activity. Crass language and profanity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound Card

short_description: A bite-sized visual novel about going on dates with some absolutely disastrous goblins.
